member.name: T:KataAPI.Class1
member.summary: This class contains 10 methods each with it's own unique function.\n This function are solutions I have created for Katas in CodeWars.\n The link to CodeWars: https://www.codewars.com/dashboard.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.ElevatorDistance(System.Int32[])
member.summary:
This method calculates the total number of floors you've climbed.
 Link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/59f061773e532d0c87000d16.
INPUT:
 Integer "array".
OUTPUT:
 An integer.
member.param: - This parameter is a integer array and contains the floors you have visited so far.
member.returns: Returns the total number of floor distance you have made.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.CircleOfNumbers(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method finds the number that is on the opposite side of the FirstNumber.
 Link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/58841cb52a077503c4000015.
INPUT:
 integer 'n'.
 A positive even integer.
Constraints: 4 ≤ n ≤ 1000.
 Integer "firstNumber" / "first_number" / "first-number".
 Constraints: 0 ≤ firstNumber ≤ n - 1.
OUTPUT:
 An integer.
member.param: - The "n" parameter is a integer and contains the limit for how many numbers the circle will have.
- The "FirstNumber" parameter is a integer whose opposite number needs to be found.
member.returns: Returns the number that is opposite from the given FirstNumber.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.MakeComplement(System.String)
member.summary:
This method the complements of each of the symbols found in our DNA.
 DNA (Deoxyribonucleic acid), is a chemical found in the nucleus of cells and holds the "blueprints" for how the living organism should function and develop.
 In DNA, the symbols 'A' and 'T' are complements of each other and so are the symbols 'C' and 'G'.
For more information: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DNA.
 The link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/554e4a2f232cdd87d9000038.
INPUT:
 String "dna".
OUTPUT:
 A string.
member.param: - This parameter is a string and holds the dna whose complement will be returned.
member.returns: Returns the complement of the each of the symbols on the given DNA.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.NumberToString(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method converts an integer value into a string.
 The link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/5265326f5fda8eb1160004c8.
INPUT:
 Integer "num".
OUTPUT:
 A string.
member.param: - This parameter is a integer and is the value which is gonna get converted into a string.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.Opposite(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method converts a number into its opposite value.
 The link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/56dec885c54a926dcd001095.
INPUT:
 Integer "number".
OUTPUT:
 An integer.
member.param: - This parameter is a integer whose opposite needs to be found.
member.returns: Return the opposite value of the number.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.humanYearsCatYearsDogYears(System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method calculates how many cat years or dog years are found in human years.
 1 human years = 15 cat/dog years.
 2 human years = 9 cat/dog years.
 3+ human years = 4 cat years and 5 dog years each year after 2 human years.
 The link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/5a6663e9fd56cb5ab800008b.
NOTE:
 humanYears >= 1,
 humanYears are whole numbers only.
INPUT:
 Integer "humanYears".
OUTPUT:
 An integer array.
member.returns: Returns how many cat/dog years are in the given humanYears as an array.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.sumTwoSmallestNumbers(System.Int32[])
member.summary:
This method finds the sum of the two smallest values of an array of integers.
 The link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/558fc85d8fd1938afb000014.
INPUT:
 Integer array "numbers".
OUTPUT:
 An integer.
member.param: - "numbers" parameter is a integer array whose the sum of the two smallest value needs to be found.
member.returns: Returns the sum of the two of the smallest values in the numbers array.

member.name: M:KataAPI.Class1.GetGoals(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
This method finds how many goals Messi has scored in three leagues. (This one is just for fun!)
 The link to this Kata: https://www.codewars.com/kata/55f73be6e12baaa5900000d4.
INPUT:
 Integer "laLigaGoals", "copaDelReyGoals", "championsLeagueGoals".
OUTPUT:
 An integer.
member.param: - The "laLigaGoals" parameter is a integer and holds the number of goals scored in that league.
- The "copaDelReyGoals" parameter is a integer and holds the number of goals scored in that league.
- The "championsLeagueGoals" parameter is a integer and holds the number of goals scored in that league.
member.returns: Returns the total number of goals scored in all three leagues.
